stepTitle: Part A: Do not used spaces unless absolutely necessary.
stepBody: A basket of $$10$$ colored tickets contains $$1$$ blue, $$1$$ gold, $$4$$ green, and $$4$$ red tickets. If you draw $$6$$ tickets uniformly at random with replacement, what is the chance that you draw at least one that is either blue or gold? Write your answer as a Python expression that computes the result exactly (no simulation).
